landing.heroDesc: AI-summarized news in a timeline. Scan in minutes, personalize for free.
landing.stopDrowning: Stop drowning in articles. Get the signal without the noise.
landing.aiPoweredDesc: Every article gets a 2-3 line summary focused on what happened and why it matters. Understand the news without clicking through.
landing.timeBasedDesc: No algorithms. Just chronological news so you never miss what's new.
landing.fortyPlusDesc: Curated from the world's most trusted publications, updated hourly.
landing.realNewsRealTime: Real news, real-time updates, zero noise
landing.step1Desc: Just visit and start reading. Sign up for more.
landing.step2Desc: Title + summary tells you everything at a glance.
landing.step3Desc: Click through only when you want the full story.
landing.realTimeAggregation: Real-time aggregation from the world's most respected publications
landing.noAccountRequired: Free to read. Better with an account.
